placement.description: placement of pop menu: bottomLeft bottomCenter bottomRight topLeft topCenter topRight
placement.description_zh: 菜单弹出位置：bottomLeft bottomCenter bottomRight topLeft topCenter topRight

size.description: size of the button, the same as Button
size.description_zh: 按钮大小，和 Button 一致

trigger.description: the trigger mode which executes the drop-down action

type.description: type of the button, the same as Button
type.description_zh: 按钮类型，和 Button 一致

v-model.description: whether the dropdown menu is visible

events.name: click
events.description: a callback function, the same as [Button](/components/button-cn/), which will be executed when you click the button on the left
events.description_zh: 点击左侧按钮的回调，和 [Button](/components/button-cn/) 一致

events.name: visibleChange
events.description: a callback function takes an argument: visible, is executed when the visible state is changed
events.description_zh: 菜单显示状态改变时调用，参数为 visible
